column4: I'd like to bind certain home folders to specific folder icons (like Documents, Downloads, Music... by default). xdg-user-dirs is here for this and indeed I'm able to add entries to .config/user-dirs.dirs, but I'm unable to find how to specify icons. The freedesktop specification doesn't mention it and my attempts at digging how it was made by my icon theme were unsuccessful. any help?
The places icons are  in <icon folder>/places/<size>/
for example the humanity icons in 64x64px are in /usr/share/icons/Humanity/places/64
